posts.post_content:
Stone,
Unglaub,
Maddox--SOLD--, 
Bridwell, no cap--SOLD--,
Ganzel,
EVERS, holding bat, Chicago,
Westlake, SL,
KELLEY--TRADED--,
G. DAVIS,
BECKLEY, portrait,
Chase, black cap, throwing,
SOLD! WALLACE,
SOLD! WILLIS, portrait,
Gilbert.

Six commons--$140-- 
These six [Stone, Unglaub, Maddox, Bridwell, Ganzel, Gilbert] are all G-VG, I'd say.  The Bridwell might appear to be Ex but has soft bottom corners.  The Ganzel is toned, if that's the right word.
 
If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. 
First to take it gets it. 

Most forms of payment okay. If paypal, pay as friend; thanks.

I am always looking to upgrade [Good or better], so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. I prefer ungraded cards. 

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. 
Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:
